verbose_text: The mechanism of the protective effect of ascorbic acid is the result of H 2 O 2 production in cancer cells, blocking the secretion of hyaluronidase, stimulating immunity, and inhibiting lysosomal glycosidases that increase the probability of developing cancer in the body [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: result of H 2 O 2  production in cancer cells, blocking the secretion of hyaluronidase, stimulating immunity, and inhibiting lysosomal glycosidases
